body:
Making this short
---------> Added to Officials fails ------->

So, The League season 1 player inscriptions closed 4 - 5 days ago and You can c players from CrazyBeaners & Jardineros that join the team 1 - 2 days ago and they're inscribed...

Kinda funny, nice.
